"This is an AMAZING service they offer for new pool owners like myself." "Extremely knowledgeable and customer centric staff!" "He spent extra time explaining all my options for a new pool pump."

I couldn’t be more thrilled with the results of my PebbleTec pool resurfacing, managed by Raul and his team at Poolwerx. From start to finish, the entire process was smooth, professional, and stress-free. … More
Poolwerx delivers top-notch service every week. My tech Jakob is always friendly, reliable, and incredibly knowledgeable. Couldn’t ask for better care for my pool!

Courteous, knowledgeable sales personnel. Good job by the crew who did the “facelift” work. A special thanks to Raul. There was a bit of an issue getting the fresh water correctly balanced, but Raul worked diligently To resolve that issue. The pool looks great!. Response from the owner 6 months ago Thanks for the review! We are blessed to have a friendly staff and hope to see you again soon.
